amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds with respect to specified States, to prevent such States from implementing their own State laws with respect to the provision of broadband Internet access service by the State or a municipality or other political subdivision of the State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds with respect to specified States, to prevent such States from implementing their own State laws with respect to the provision of broadband Internet access service by the State or a municipality or other political subdivision of the State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 200 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A041) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 200 (Roll no. 423).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
